Uses of Class
Model.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    Model  

    • Uses of Item in Model

      Subclasses of Item in Model 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Arrow
      extends item, this is a possible drop from enemies and replenishes the player's stock of arrows.
      class  Heart
      extends item, this is a possible enemy drop and restores player health.
      class  Key
      Extends the item class and provides all of the fields for a key item
      class  SpeedBuff
      Loot item that increases the player's speed, provides the necessary fields
      Methods in Model that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Item Enemy.lootDrop()
      returns the item the enemy dropped
      Item Obstacle.lootDrop()
      returns the item the enemy dropped
      Methods in Model that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Item> Enemy.getDrops()
      Getter for the enemy's drop table
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Item> Obstacle.getDrops()
      Getter for the enemy's drop table
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> Area.getLoot()
      getter for the area's loot list
      Methods in Model with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Area.addLoot​(Item loot)
      adds the passed in Item to the Area's loot list
      void Area.removeLoot​(Item loot)
      removes a loot item from the area's loot list
